content.query:
-- Admin accounts (found in Synapse workspace > properties)
    -- 1. Server Admin --- user name and passowrd
    --  2. Active Directory Admin -----inidviaul, AD Groups authentications

    select * from sys.sql_logins;
-- Serverless:
-- https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/sql/sql-authentication?tabs=serverless
-- https://www.serverlesssql.com/user-permissions-in-serverless-sql-pools-external-tables-vs-views/


-- Dedicated Pool:
-- https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/sql-data-warehouse/sql-data-warehouse-authentication
